document.description: White sandy beaches and idyllic offshore islands are what put Puerto Rico on tourist maps in the first place. The best beaches are labeled on the “Puerto Rico” map on ...

Frommer's Puerto Rico Much more detailed and complete than its major competitors, Frommer's Puerto Rico, 10th Edition gives you in-depth, honest reviews of lavish honeymoon resorts, intimate inns, fa... ( More ) Much more detailed and complete than its major competitors, Frommer's Puerto Rico, 10th Edition gives you in-depth, honest reviews of lavish honeymoon resorts, intimate inns, family-friendly condos, and dirt cheap hostels. This guide was researched and written by a travel writer and city news reporter based in San Juan, this edition has its finger on the pulse of the island, with updates on the latest openings and selections in every price category. We'll point you to a gorgeous white-sand beach that only locals know about, give you the scoop on both upscale dining and roadside nosh pits, and we list the best places for snorkeling, hiking, golf, sailing, deep-sea fishing.You'll also get a complete shopper's guide, and up-to-date coverage of the newest nightlife in the region, from casinos to salsa clubs to lowkey beach bars. Includes a color fold-out map. ( Less ) 2,134 Reads Info and Rating Category: Uncategorized.
